entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
